SQL_STMT_U.val: select y.[Supplier Code],y.[Supplier Name],x.[Object Type],x.[Document Number],y.[Transaction Date],y.[Due Date],y.Currency,y.[Invoice Amount] Inv_Amount,x.outstanding OUTSTANDING,DATEDIFF(day,y.[Due Date],SYSDATETIME()) aging,S.gcm_id,v.Comments from ( select [Object Type],[Document Number],sum([invoice amount]) outstanding from ap_history_view where [Supplier Name] like '%:1%' and [Transaction Date]<=':2' :4 group by [Object Type],[Document Number] )x left join ap_history_view y on y.[Object Type]=x.[Object Type] and y.[Document Number]=x.[Document Number] and y.[Payment Number]=0 left join ALLDOC_VIEW v on v.OBJTYPE=x.[Object Type] and v.DOCNUM=x.[Document Number] left join sys_gcm s on condition='AGING' AND DATEDIFF(day,y.[Due Date],SYSDATETIME()) BETWEEN GCM_NUM AND CONVERT(NUMERIC,GCM_NOTE1) where x.outstanding<>0 and y.[Supplier Code] is not null :3 order by y.[Supplier Code]

SELECT [Supplier Code],[Supplier Name],SUM(OUTSTANDING) outstanding FROM ( select y.[Supplier Code],y.[Supplier Name],x.[Object Type],x.[Document Number],y.[Transaction Date],y.[Due Date],y.Currency,x.outstanding,DATEDIFF(day,y.[Due Date],SYSDATETIME()) aging,S.DESCRIPTION from ( select [Object Type],[Document Number],sum([invoice amount]) outstanding from ap_history_view where [Supplier Name] like '%:1%' and [Transaction Date]<=':2' :4 group by [Object Type],[Document Number] )x left join ap_history_view y on y.[Object Type]=x.[Object Type] and y.[Document Number]=x.[Document Number] and y.[Payment Number]=0 left join sys_gcm s on condition='AGING' AND DATEDIFF(day,y.[Due Date],':2') BETWEEN GCM_NUM AND CONVERT(NUMERIC,GCM_NOTE1) where x.outstanding<>0 and y.[Supplier Code] is not null :3 )A GROUP BY [Supplier Code],[Supplier Name] order by SUM(OUTSTANDING) desc

select x.[Object Type],x.[Document Number],y.[Transaction Date],y.[Due Date],y.Currency,x.outstanding,DATEDIFF(day,y.[Due Date],SYSDATETIME()) aging,S.DESCRIPTION from ( select [Object Type],[Document Number],sum([invoice amount]) outstanding from ap_history_view where [Supplier code]=':1' and [Transaction Date]<=':2' :4 group by [Object Type],[Document Number] )x left join ap_history_view y on y.[Object Type]=x.[Object Type] and y.[Document Number]=x.[Document Number] and y.[Payment Number]=0 left join sys_gcm s on condition='AGING' AND DATEDIFF(day,y.[Due Date],':2') BETWEEN GCM_NUM AND CONVERT(NUMERIC,GCM_NOTE1) where x.outstanding<>0 and y.[Supplier Code] is not null :3

SELECT SUM(OUTSTANDING) outstanding FROM ( select y.[Supplier Code],y.[Supplier Name],x.[Object Type],x.[Document Number],y.[Transaction Date],y.[Due Date],y.Currency,x.outstanding,DATEDIFF(day,y.[Due Date],SYSDATETIME()) aging,S.DESCRIPTION from ( select [Object Type],[Document Number],sum([invoice amount]) outstanding from ap_history_view where [Supplier Name] like '%:1%' and [Transaction Date]<=':2' :4 group by [Object Type],[Document Number] )x left join ap_history_view y on y.[Object Type]=x.[Object Type] and y.[Document Number]=x.[Document Number] and y.[Payment Number]=0 left join sys_gcm s on condition='AGING' AND DATEDIFF(day,y.[Due Date],':2') BETWEEN GCM_NUM AND CONVERT(NUMERIC,GCM_NOTE1) where x.outstanding<>0 and y.[Supplier Code] is not null :3 )A

ExpSyntax.val: DStr({0,238},'DD MMMMMMMMMM YYYY') & '-' & DStr({0,239},'DD MMMMMMMMMM YYYY')
MlsTrans('All,Not Due,1-30 Days,31-60 Days,61-90 Days,91-120 Days,Over 120 Days')
MlsTrans('All,Not Due,1-30 Days,31-60 Days,61-90 Days,91-120 Days,Over 120 Days')
